data.name: CleanCommandDesc
data.value: Deletes all library files defined in libman.json from the project

data.name: CleanCommandRemarks
data.value: Deletes any folders that become empty after this operation.

data.name: DefaultDestinationOptionDesc
data.value: The path, relative to the current directory, where library files should be installed if no destination is defined for a given library.

data.name: DefaultProviderOptionDesc
data.value: The provider to use if no provider is defined for a given library. (eg. “cdnjs”, “filesystem”)

data.name: DestinationOptionDesc
data.value: Location to install the library (if not specified, the default destination location will be used)

data.name: ExamplesHeader
data.value: Examples:

data.name: FilesOptionDesc
data.value: The files from the specified library to install (if not specified, all files from the library will be installed)

data.name: InitCommandDesc
data.value: Create a new libman.json

data.name: InstallCommandDesc
data.value: Add a library definition to the LibMan.json file, and download the library to the specified location

data.name: InstallCommandExamples
data.value: libman install jquery@3.2.1 libman install jquery --provider cdnjs --destination wwwroot\scripts\jquery --files jquery.min.js libman install myCalendar --provider filesystem --files calendar.js --files calendar.css

data.name: InstallCommandLibraryIdArgumentDesc
data.value: Library to install

data.name: InstallCommandProviderSpecificLogic
data.value: CDNJS libraries have a library ID format of “<libraryName>@<libraryVersion>”. For CDNJS libraries, if no version is specified in the library ID, the highest version available is used.

data.name: InstallCommandRemarks
data.value: Initializes a libman.json if one does not exist. If no default provider exists, --provider option is required. If no default destination exists, --destination option is required. If no files are specified, the entire library is included.

data.name: InvalidArgumentsMessage
data.value: Invalid arguments for command: {0}

data.name: LibmanCommandDesc
data.value: Library Manager

data.name: ProviderOptionDesc
data.value: Provider to use (if not specified, the default provider will be used)

data.name: ProviderSpecificLogicHeader
data.value: Provider-specific logic:

data.name: RemarksHeader
data.value: Remarks:

data.name: RestoreCommandDesc
data.value: Downloads all files from provider and saves them to specified destination.

data.name: RestoreCommandRemarks
data.value: Error if no libman.json in current folder. If a library specifies a provider, it will override the defaultProvider. If a library specifies a destination, it will override the defaultDestination.

data.name: UnInstallCommandDesc
data.value: Deletes all files for the specified library from their specified destination, then removess the specified library definition from libman.json

data.name: UnInstallCommandExamples
data.value: libman uninstall jquery libman uninstall jquery --provider cdnjs libman uninstall myCalendar –p filesystem

data.name: UninstallCommandLibraryIdArgumentDesc
data.value: Library to uninstall

data.name: UninstallCommandProviderOptionDesc
data.value: The provider of the library to be uninstalled

data.name: UnInstallCommandProviderSpecificLogic
data.value: CDNJS libraries have a library ID format of “<libraryName>@<libraryVersion>”. If no version is specified in the library ID, this command will act on any library with libraryName matching the given libraryId.

data.name: UnInstallCommandRemarks
data.value: Error if not exactly one library found. Use the provider attribute to disambiguate libraries of the same name from different providers in the same project. If there is only one library by the given name in the current project, provider attribute can be omitted.

data.name: VerbosityOptionDesc
data.value: Set the verbosity of output (eg. "normal", "detailed", "quiet")

data.name: ProjectPathOptionDesc
data.value: Path to the project (Current directory is used as default).

data.name: DirectoryNotFoundMessage
data.value: Directory not found {0}

data.name: FailedToRestoreLibraryMessage
data.value: Failed to restore library. [{0}] : {1}

data.name: FileDeleted
data.value: {0} deleted

data.name: FileDeleteFail
data.value: Failed to delete {0}

data.name: FileWrittenToDisk
data.value: {0} written to disk

data.name: InitFailedLibmanJsonFileExists
data.value: Failed to init: A 'libman.json' already exists.

data.name: CleanFailed
data.value: Failed to clean some files.

data.name: LibmanJsonNotFound
data.value: libman.json was not found:{0}

data.name: DestinationRequiredWhenNoDefaultIsPresent
data.value: Default destination is not set. Please provide a destination using '--destination'.

data.name: LibraryIdRequiredForInstall
data.value: LibraryId is required to install

data.name: LibraryIdRequiredForUnInstall
data.value: LibraryId is required to uninstall

data.name: MoreThanOneLibraryFoundToUninstall
data.value: More than one library found with id '{0}'.

data.name: ProviderRequiredWhenNoDefaultIsPresent
data.value: Default Provider is not set. Please provide a provider using '--provider'

data.name: UseProviderToDisambiguateMessage
data.value: Use --provider to disambiguate libraries of same name from different providers in the project.

data.name: MoreThanOneLibraryFoundToUninstallForProvider
data.value: More than one library found with id '{0}' for provider '{1}'. Please remove the manually from the libman.json file.

data.name: NoLibraryToUninstall
data.value: Library '{0}' is not installed. Nothing to uninstall.

data.name: CacheCleanCommandDesc
data.value: Delete all files from the local machine's LibMan cache.

data.name: CacheListCommandDesc
data.value: Display a list of all libraries that are stored in the local machine’s LibMan cache.

data.name: CacheCleanProviderArgumentDesc
data.value: Provider for which the cache files should be cleaned.

data.name: UpdateCommandDesc
data.value: Updates (upgrades) the specified library (or all libraries if none specified) to the latest version.

data.name: UpdateCommandExamples
data.value: libman update libman update jquery libman update --provider cdnjs libman update jquery --provider cdnjs libman update jquery -pre libman update jquery@3.2.1

data.name: UpdateCommandRemarks
data.value: Error if no libman.json in current folder. Error if specified library doesn't exist. To specify a specific version, use the Install command.

data.name: UpdateCommandLibraryArgumentDesc
data.value: Library to update to latest version.

data.name: UpdateCommandPreReleaseOptionDesc
data.value: If specified, the latest pre-release version of the library will be downloaded (where applicable).

data.name: UpdateCommandProviderOptionDesc
data.value: If specified, only libraries from the specified provider will be updated.

data.name: CacheCleanedMessage
data.value: Cache cleaned.

data.name: CacheCleanFailed
data.value: Failed to clean cache: {0}

data.name: CacheContentMessage
data.value: Cache contents:

data.name: CacheEmptyMessage
data.value: (empty)

data.name: CacheForProviderCleanedMessage
data.value: {0} cache cleaned.

data.name: CacheListDetailedOptionDesc
data.value: List details about the which files are available for each library
